basics.name: Kevin Jesus Olvera
basics.label: Skilled software developer with expertise in Python, virtualization, and web applications, adept in both team and solo projects.
basics.summary: Software developer with Python, Ansible, Flask, MySQL with good experience with virtualization and containerization of services with KVM and Docker. Good Experience with PEP-8 and Google coding Guidelines in Python. Excellent working knowledge of designing and implementation of Web applications and monitoring systems as well as familiar with concepts and devices such routers, switches and TCP/IP protocols. Highly motivated, dedicated, quick learner and have proven ability to work individually and as a team.

work.name: Nokia Operations de México S.A. de C.V.
work.summary: Performed configuration and automation of IP equipments for SD-WAN platforms for service providers in Latin America.

work.name: Nokia Operations de México S.A. de C.V.
work.summary: Automated the configuration of equipments of an SD-WAN platform through the use of APIs, generating a reduction in configuration times by up to 40% with the possibility of replicating this automation in future projects. Designed and implemented prototypes of WEB systems for the management of cost and effort quotes for the different IP products and services offered by the company. Performed consulting and implementation activities of monitoring solutions for SD-WAN platforms for service providers in Latin America and North America.

skills_description: Proficient in Microsoft Office and Adobe Acrobat suite, knowledgeable with KVM and Docker, familiar with automation technologies such Ansible and Terraform
